name: Hiroll
description: This game, a true test of one's abilities to think in 3d, places you ontop of the cubic rocklike formations between clouds and waterfalls. In this bizar but peaceful place a lonesome Cube hopes your encouraged to try and guide it toward its pursuit of connection. On its journey finding the right partners. A connection is formed when they do meet and are able to aligning correctly , attaching them together. These connections, fragile and in general difficult to sustain.  That is, if they are able form to start with seen the complex rules and systems making up this world that is Hiroll.
